duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide sales administration support and generate sales-related reports.
Identify and quantify billing adjustments and work order errors to improve accuracy.
Research and ensure timely collection of revenue through communication with distributors.
Coordinate data collection and generate reports as requested.
Undertake all aspects of credit control work and resolve fee-related issues.
Review client ledger balance reports and take necessary actions in relation to client funds.

education_certification.credential: High School or Equivalent, 2-5 years related experience, Previous Sales experience preferred, SalesForce, Avaya, Microsoft Office & CSG experience preferred
